ModMetaData.name: VFE:M Drones Can pick Weapons
ModMetaData.author: Wololo
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that allows combat mechanoids to equip any weapon.
Thanks to Helixen and his great mod: Reinforced Mechanoids: Volume One, who gave me the idea to make this simple patch.
And of course to the Vanilla Expended team for their framework that makes this possible.
